text: It Happened at the Police Station () is a 1963 Soviet drama movie directed by Villen Azarov.Сергею Никоненко - 80. За что мы любим артистаЭТО СЛУЧИЛОСЬ В МИЛИЦИИ It stars Vsevolod Sanaev, Mark Bernes, and Vyacheslav Nevinnyy. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1963 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
